mapper.select: SELECT usr.USER_ID ,B.MEM_TYPE ,A.MEM_LVL ,B.MEM_CODE ,B.NAME ,C.ORG_CODE ,C.GRP_CODE ,C.DEPT_CODE ,B.BRNCH ,A.BRNCH_ID AS ORG_BRANCH ,B.MEM_ID ,D.CODE MEMBER_TYPE FROM SYS0047M usr, ORG0005D A, ORG0001D B, ORG1001V C, SYS0013M D WHERE usr.USER_NAME = B.MEM_CODE AND B.MEM_ID = A.MEM_ID AND C.MEM_ID = B.MEM_ID AND usr.USER_STUS_ID = 1 AND B.STUS = 1 AND A.ORG_STUS_CODE_ID = 1 AND B.MEM_TYPE = D.CODE_ID AND D.CODE_MASTER_ID = 1 AND usr.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT C.CODE, C.CODE_ID FROM SYS0047M U JOIN ORG0001D A ON A.MEM_CODE = U.HR_CODE JOIN SYS0005M B ON BRNCH_ID = BRNCH JOIN SYS0013M C ON C.CODE_ID = B.TYPE_ID AND CODE_MASTER_ID = 45 WHERE U.USER_ID = #{userId}
